We are Paradox, the AI company that believes recruiting is a people game.  Our flagship product is Olivia, the AI recruiting assistant obsessed with improving and reinventing the candidate experience.Olivia helps companies capture and screen candidates, improve conversions, and answer all candidate questions.  She delivers one-to-one candidate experience at scale, and even handles interview scheduling.

Recruiting Ventures invests in leading talent acquisition software.Portfolio companies, includes:- Olivia by Paradox- Jobing.com- Recruiting.com- Hire Story- Local Careers- Onboarding.com- Outplacing.com

We help companies compete for talent.  At Recruiting.com, our innovative talent acquisition software enables organizations to find and effectively recruit talent through our social, mobile and search engine optimized career sites and our candidate relationship management system.CEO from 2012-2016

At Jobing.com, we help employers simplify the process of hiring qualified individuals to contribute to their organizations’ goals. We are committed to connecting local employers with local job seekers by building the most localized, relevant, and personalized job discovery experiences.CEO from 1999-2016

Aaron invests in his people. Working at Jobing.com for Aaron taught me that technology only works when there are good people behind it and when it's developed with people in mind. Also, that good marketing and salesmanship go hand-in-hand. Aaron proved time and again his people first mentality by taking input from those around him, matching people to business needs and believing in his people's potential.Behind Jobing.com's success is a  man who has a mind for marketing and business, and a true heart for people.

summary: ** We are hiring talented professionals across professions to grow our company - http://careers.paradox.aiAaron is the Founder/CEO of Paradox; and is the founder of multiple companies in the recruiting space, including Jobing.com and Recruiting.com.  He's lead organizations that have achieved 6 years of over 100% CAGR, and 3 consecutive Inc. 500 awards.  He was awarded the 2008 Arizona Business Leadership award, and received the distinguished alumni award from ASU WP Carey.Aaron is also the managing partner and investor in Recruiting Ventures (RV).  RV invests in leading talent acquisition software and marketing service companies that evolve the recruiting and human resource industries in ways that help both businesses and job seekers.Aaron is a recognized expert on recruiting, employment branding and recruitment software & technology, and has spoken and dozens of national & local human resources conferences.Previously, Aaron has served on the executive committee for the Greater Phoenix Economic Council,  the Board of Governors for the International Association of Employment Websites, the board of the Dean’s Council at the W. P. Carey School of Business at Arizona State University, and a board member for Area VI of the Society of Human Resources Management. His hobbies include design, architecture, aquaculture, and permaculture.  He is an avid cyclist and proud three-time Ironman finisher.
name: Aaron Matos
title: Founder/CEO at Olivia by Paradox.ai
